properties.Name: Craters of the Moon National Monument and Preserve
properties.Description: A vast ocean of lava flows with scattered islands of cinder cones and sagebrush, it is a unique volcanic area.

properties.Name: Shoshone Falls
properties.Description: Known as the 'Niagara of the West,' it is 212 feet high and one of the largest natural waterfalls in the United States.

properties.Name: Sawtooth National Recreation Area
properties.Description: A protected area offering breathtaking mountain views, hiking trails, and abundant wildlife.

properties.Name: Hells Canyon National Recreation Area
properties.Description: The deepest river gorge in North America, known for its rugged landscapes and rich history.

properties.Name: City of Rocks National Reserve
properties.Description: Famous for its scenic granite spires and extensive rock climbing opportunities.

properties.Name: Sun Valley Resort
properties.Description: A premier destination for skiing, hiking, and year-round recreation.

properties.Name: Bruneau Dunes State Park
properties.Description: Home to North America's tallest single-structured sand dune and a popular spot for stargazing.

properties.Name: Yellowstone National Park (Idaho Entrance)
properties.Description: Part of the iconic Yellowstone National Park, known for its geothermal features and diverse wildlife.

properties.Name: Salmon Idaho
properties.Description: A historic town offering outdoor activities like fishing, rafting, and exploring the Lewis and Clark trail.

properties.Name: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument
properties.Description: Renowned for its fossil beds, showcasing prehistoric plants and animals, including the Hagerman horse.

properties.Name: Borah Peak
properties.Description: The highest peak in Idaho, popular for challenging climbs and breathtaking views.

properties.Name: Island Park
properties.Description: A beautiful area known for its scenic landscapes, wildlife, and outdoor recreational activities.

properties.Name: Lake Coeur d'Alene
properties.Description: A stunning lake offering boating, fishing, and other water sports, surrounded by beautiful mountains.

properties.Name: Silverwood Theme Park
properties.Description: The largest theme park in the Pacific Northwest, featuring rides, shows, and a water park.

properties.Name: Nez Perce National Historical Park
properties.Description: A park dedicated to preserving the history and culture of the Nez Perce tribe.

properties.Name: Perrine Bridge
properties.Description: An iconic bridge spanning the Snake River, popular for BASE jumping and scenic views.

properties.Name: Old Idaho Penitentiary
properties.Description: A historic prison that operated from 1872 to 1973, now a museum with exhibits on prison history.

properties.Name: Museum of Idaho
properties.Description: A museum featuring exhibits on the history, science, and culture of Idaho and the surrounding region.

properties.Name: Boise River Greenbelt
properties.Description: A scenic 25-mile path along the Boise River, popular for biking, walking, and enjoying nature.

properties.Name: Idaho State Capitol
properties.Description: The seat of Idaho's government, a neoclassical building known for its stunning architecture and history.
